Assignment Create View

The view for creating new laptop assignments to users.

Overview

This view provides a form for creating new assignments, including:

  • User selection
  • Laptop selection
  • Assignment date
  • Return date
  • Notes
  • QR code generation

Form Features

  • Autocomplete user search
  • Available laptops dropdown
  • Date validation
  • Dynamic QR code generation
  • File attachments

ViewData Properties

  • Users: List of available users
  • Laptops: List of available laptops
  • Title: "Create New Assignment"

JavaScript Functions

  • generateQRCode(): Generates QR code for the assignment
  • validateDates(): Ensures valid date selections
  • searchUsers(): AJAX user search
  • searchLaptops(): AJAX laptop search

Validation

  • Required fields:
    • User
    • Laptop
    • Assignment Date
    • Return Date
  • Business rules:
    • Return date must be after assignment date
    • Laptop must be available
    • User cannot have more than 3 active assignments

Related Files

  • Controller: AssignmentsController.Create()
  • Model: Assignment.cs
  • JavaScript: assignment-create.js
  • CSS: assignment-styles.css
  • Edit this page
